results.title: Metformin Attenuates Silica-Induced Pulmonary Fibrosis by Activating Autophagy via the AMPK-mTOR Signaling Pathway
results.text_hl: Our results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ significantly alleviated the @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@fibrosis@@@ of @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung@@@ tissues of @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ exposed to @CHEMICAL_Silicon_Dioxide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D012822 @@@silica@@@ particles.

results.text_hl: Thus, these important pharmacological properties make @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ a candidate to treat complex @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@pulmonary diseases@@@ that continue to have unmet medical needs.

results.text_hl: It has been supposed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can limit the onset and duration of a cytokine storm-like responses, particularly upon @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung damage@@@ thereby preventing excessive @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung damage@@@.

results.title: Evaluation of the Mitigation Effect of Spirulina Against Lung Injury Induced by Radiation in Rats.
results.text_hl: Both @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and @SPECIES_551299 @@@Spirulina@@@ increased the SOD and GPx activity in @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung@@@ tissue.

results.title: Metabolic and Metabolomic Effects of Metformin in Murine Model of Pulmonary Adenoma Formation.
results.text_hl: Metabolomic analysis revealed metabolite alterations consistent with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment. Based on these results, we conclude that previous reductions in @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung adenomas@@@ may have been occurred from anticancer effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ rather than a potentially toxic effect such as calorie restriction.

results.title: Immunologic and imaging signatures in post tuberculosis lung disease.
results.text_hl: Next, we discuss the role of novel host directed therapies (HDT) to limit the development of @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@PTLD@@@ and in particular, the recent repurposing of established medications such as statins, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Doxycycline @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004318 @@@doxycycline@@@.

results.title: Metformin ameliorates cardiopulmonary toxicity induced by chlorpyrifos.
results.text_hl: This study aimed to investigate the modulatory impacts of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ on @CHEMICAL_Chlorpyrifos @CHEMICAL_MESH:D004390 @@@CPF@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@heart and lung damage@@@.

results.title: Enhancement of Radiation Response Associated With Metformin in Hepatocellular Carcinoma: Preclinical Animal and Clinical Cohort Study.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: The combinations of gamma-ray and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and neutron radiation and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ inhibited @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumour@@@ growth and metastatic @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung@@@ nodule formation when compared to the monotherapy and gamma-ray groups, respectively.

results.title: Metformin enhances protection in guinea pigs chronically infected with Mycobacterium tuberculosis
results.text_hl: Despite persistent @DISEASE_Glucose_Intolerance @DISEASE_MESH:D018149 @@@glucose intolerance@@@, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated @SPECIES_10141 @@@guinea pigs@@@ had a 2.8-fold reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Lung_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D008171 @@@lung lesion@@@ burden and a 0.7 log decrease in CFUs.
